00022 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_REPLACE         (1 << 0)   
00024 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_WITH_ID         (1 << 1)   
00026 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_L2       (1 << 2)   
00028 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_IP_GRE   (1 << 3)   
00030 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_PAYLOAD_UNTAGGED (1 << 4)   
00032 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_TRILL    (1 << 5)   
00034 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_NIV      (1 << 6)

00040 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_DEST_MULTICAST  (1 << 9)   
00042 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_WITH_ENCAP_ID (1 << 10)  
00044 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_RSPAN    (1 << 12)  
00047 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_INT_PRI_SET     (1 << 13)  
00050 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_ETAG     (1 << 14)  
00052 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_SFLOW    (1 << 15)  
00055 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_IS_SNOOP        (1 << 16)  
00058 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_IS_TRAP         (1 << 17)  
00061 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_EGRESS_ADD_ORIG_SYSTEM_HEADER (1 << 18)  
00067 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_FIELD           (1 << 19)  
00070 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_PORT            (1 << 20)  
00073 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_UPDATE_COUNTER_1 (1 << 21)  
00074 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_UPDATE_COUNTER_2 (1 << 22)  
00076 typedef struct opennsl_mirror_options_s {
00077     uint32 flags;           
00078     uint8 forward_strength; 
00079     uint8 copy_strength;    
00080     uint32 recycle_cmd;     
00081 } opennsl_mirror_options_t;
00082 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00089 typedef struct opennsl_mirror_destination_s {
00090     opennsl_gport_t mirror_dest_id;     
00092     uint32 flags;                       
00094     opennsl_gport_t gport;              
00095     uint8 version;                      
00096     uint8 tos;                          
00097     uint8 ttl;                          
00098     opennsl_ip_t src_addr;              
00099     opennsl_ip_t dst_addr;              
00100     opennsl_ip6_t src6_addr;            
00101     opennsl_ip6_t dst6_addr;            
00102     uint32 flow_label;                  
00103     opennsl_mac_t src_mac;              
00104     opennsl_mac_t dst_mac;              
00105     uint16 tpid;                        
00106     opennsl_vlan_t vlan_id;             
00107     opennsl_trill_name_t trill_src_name; 
00108     opennsl_trill_name_t trill_dst_name; 
00109     int trill_hopcount;                 
00110     uint16 niv_src_vif;                 
00111     uint16 niv_dst_vif;                 
00113     uint32 niv_flags;                   
00114     uint16 gre_protocol;                
00115     opennsl_policer_t policer_id;       
00116     int stat_id;                        
00117     opennsl_if_t encap_id;              
00118     opennsl_if_t tunnel_id;             
00122     uint16 reserved1; 
00123     uint8 pkt_prio;                     
00124     uint32 reserved2; 
00125     uint32 reserved3; 
00126     uint8 int_pri;                      
00127     uint16 etag_src_vid;                
00128     uint16 etag_dst_vid;                
00129     uint16 udp_src_port;                
00130     uint16 udp_dst_port;                
00131     uint32 reserved4; 
00132     uint32 reserved5; 
00133     uint8 recycle_context;              
00135     uint16 packet_copy_size;            
00139     uint16 egress_packet_copy_size;     
00144     uint8 reserved6; 
00145 } opennsl_mirror_destination_t;
